title: Carmen Callil, Founder of the Feminist Press Virago, Dies at 84
description: She upended the clubby male landscape of British publishing, and expanded the literary canon, reintroducing works by forgotten women authors.
dc:creator: Penelope Green

media:content.media:credit: Peter Morris/Fairfax Media via Getty Images
media:content.media:description: Carmen Callil of the publishing house Virago in 1983. “I always wanted to change the world,” she once said. “It simply wasn’t good enough.”
